name: Square 1
description:
Ladies and squares it's finally here!  But first, what is this game about?

Well it's a game about squares, guns, bad humor and pop culture references. What more could you ask for?

Square-1 FEATURES:

  • Action oriented gameplay with different guns and different play styles
  • Platforming with 32 different levels
  • Three bosses
  • SIX hidden Easter eggs in total + one secret level that doesn't appear in the level select screen
  • Amazing soundtrack by my friend Tamkish (https://tamkish.bandcamp.com/)
  • Bad humor

Send me a message if you manage to find all the Easter eggs so I know you are an epic gamer
